title: 'A ROTTEN ideology!' Reform insider blasts 'suicidal empathy' of Palestine Action group after ban ruled unlawful
tags: the proscribed group should not be banned;Met Police refuses to arrest Palestine Action supporters despite group remaining banned even after court win;Palestine Action activists cleared of burglary following break-in at Israeli-linked defence firm;Metropolitan Police arrest 86 Palestine Action activists for 'trespassing into high-security prison';The GB News Editorial Charter
